transcript:
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Good morning sir.
Executive: Very good morning ma'am. Good morning sir.
Customer: Very good morning. Sir main jo bhi hamare account handle kar rahe hain sir. Maine do ha main nahi kar raha do week to diya. Haan sir aapko sir do week diya lekin aap to hamesha mere ko yahi keh rahe hain inquiry matlab aa jayegi aa jayegi. Sir do se teen week ho gayi inquiry aap aaj ka hi inquiry dekh lijiye number of inquiry kya hai.
Customer: Aap ek bar please account main aapka account open kar leta hu. Naam company ka naam kya hai aapka?
Customer: Tulshyam Healthcare Private Limited. Uh GLID kya hai mam bata dena. Tulshyam Healthcare Private Limited.
Executive: Ek minute main abhi dal ke dekh leta hu.
Customer: Sir aap new hiring hai kya?
Executive: Mam aapka account dekh raha tha main. Aapka kya hai na aawaz clear nahi aa rahi hai mere ko to wahi main dekh raha tha ki aapki Healthcare Private Limited hai na. Hmm. Krushan. Tulshyam. Mam spelling batayenge Krushan aap jo bata rahe hain uski. Tulshyam T U T U. Aaj Tulshyam Healthcare Private Limited Gorakhpur. Theek hai mam aapki company mujhe dikh gayi. Aur aur aur isme aapko by lead ki dikkat hai na abhi dekh leta hu main isko khol ke abhi kuch available hai ya nahi.
Customer: Lead manager mein kuch bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Kuch bhi nahi hai. Main abhi dekh leta hu. Dekh lunga usme kitni lead hai. Kya mam? Jo hamara account pehle handle kar rahe the unko aap ab wo kar dijiye handle karne dijiye.
Customer: Is it possible?
Executive: Mam wo abhi to wo company mein nahi hai. Main apne senior se ek bar dekh leta hu abhi air bed ki isme inquiry padi hui hai 16 ghante pehle ki. Ek by lead padi hui hai mam ek ghante pehle spin tech air bed batteries ki aapne dekhi thi ek ghante isko kuch karte by lead to hum ja ke by lead to usko wo karenge aap lead manager mein jaiye na.
Customer: Mam calls aapko 12 inquiry aayi hai 7 June mein. Aur do aapko call aayi hai. Sir ye aapko jyada din mein 12 inquiry aati hai.
Executive: 21 June aur main isko check kar le raha hu. Main aap mere ko do minute ka time de do main pura analysis kar tab aapko connect karunga ek bar.
Customer: Sir main ek simple sa wo ya mail kar de rahi hu ki jo hamare purane manager handle kar rahe the.
Executive: Main dekh hi le raha hu usko line pe hi rahiye aap isme kya issue aa raha hai inquiry ka aapka do week se humko yahi keh rahe hain ki aa jayega aa jayega aa jayega. Mam aap 20 October. Main dekh leta hu usme.
Executive: Mam aayegi mam inquiry aayegi. Sir aapko koi issue hoga kya? Agar main mail kar dungi to koi issue to koi issue to hoga nahi aapko. Mam issue to hoga kyu nahi hoga agar aap mail kar denge to meri complaint ho jayegi.
Customer: Oh ho to fir sir ek bar aap baat kar lijiye aap apne way mein handle karwa dijiye main nahi chahti hu meri wajah se kisi ka nuksan ho. Aur bilkul nahi chahti hu ki bas aap apne way mein dekh lijiye kaise aap jo hamare shayad Govinda Govind sir hai ha Govind naam tha unko aap apne way mein dekh lijiye. Pratyaksh pratyaksh hoga mam. Nahi nahi nahi Govind. Govind 100% Govind. Kya mam Shubham sir se aapki last time baat hui thi 11 tarikh ko. Hmm. Shubham sir se hui thi na aapki baat? Haan. Haan. Isme inquiry ha mam dekhte hain. Hmm hmm. Theek hai dekhte hain aapse connect karta hu main ek minute isme jo mam aisa hota hai mam jitni aap jitna by lead wagera use karte hain na uski utni aapki visibility increase hoti hai. To mam ye cheez iske kya hai na ek pattern follow karta hai ye. Jaise instagram pe aap jis jiski cheez jyada dekhenge wahi cheez aapko jyada dikhayega usi tarike se mam jitni jyada aap by lead yaha pe consume karenge utna aapko aapka visibility mam badhegi plus aapki jo aapko inquiry aur calls wagera wo badhengi. Mam aapko abhi kitni matlab valid mil rahi hai aapko? 10 mil rahi hongi. Hello. 10 plus 7 17. 17 valid aapko milti hai. Sir ha ha ha to hum jo GST verified hota hai usi ko call karte hain. By lead se jo lead manager mein aate hain unse hum baat kar lete hain. Achcha. Dekhiye by lead mein kya aaya hot bag ka GST verified. Hot water bag hot water bag mam ye 18 ghante purani lead hai. Haan. Mam aapne isko kitne time baad consume kiya tha? Abhi consume kar rahi hu. Mam aap 18 ghante baad mam kisi lead ko agar aap consume karenge to aapko lagta hai mam abhi tak kisi bhi supplier ne usko contact nahi kiya hoga. Sir ye to possible nahi na hai ki within two minutes five minutes main Mam two minutes nahi within India mart kehta hai within one and one hour aap lead ko consume kijiye. Usme aapko conversion conversion rate aapko achcha milega. India mart mein ek employee main bitha rakho. To mam isko aap bhi mam dekh sakte hain na. Aap usko phone mein open kar lijiye phone mein usko dekhte rahiye. baat sunne mein bhi achchi lagi. Main to yahi to keh raha hu ki aap isko matlab fresh lead aap matlab consume kijiye. Yahi to keh raha hu main. Theek hai ek bar aap dekh lijiye apne end se sir. Okay okay okay. Baki sir main bilkul nahi chahti hu aapko koi matlab nuksan pahunche aap dekh lijiye kaise unko handover karna hai. Hmm hmm hmm. Theek hai mam. Haan. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough buyleads.

- Wants previous account manager to handle account.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's account for buyleads.

- Executive explained how visibility increases with buylead usage.

- Executive offered to analyze the account further.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect after analysis.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account handling, visibility, inquiry

seller_categories.mcat_name: Dr Morepen Blood Glucose Test Strips
